data.name: Bulbasaur
data.flavorText: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this Pokémon.

data.name: Ludicolo
data.flavorText: If it hears festive music, all its muscles fill with energy. It can't help breaking out into a dance.

data.name: Morelull
data.flavorText: It scatters its shining spores around itself. Even though they're dangerous, nighttime tours of forests where Morelull live are popular.

data.name: Charmander
data.flavorText: The flame on its tail indicates Charmander's life force. If it is healthy, the flame burns brightly.

data.name: Charizard
data.flavorText: When expelling a blast of superhot fire, the red flame at the tip of its tail burns more intensely.

data.name: Arcanine
data.flavorText: Legends tell of its fighting alongside a general and conquering a whole country.

data.name: Psyduck
data.flavorText: Using psychokinesis gives it a headache, so it normally passes the time spacing out and doing as little as possible.

data.name: Magikarp
data.flavorText: In the distant past, they were fairly strong, but they have become gradually weaker over time.

data.name: Greninja
data.flavorText: It creates throwing stars out of compressed water. When it spins them and throws them at high speed, these stars can split metal in two.

data.name: Detective Pikachu
data.flavorText: He loves to show off his vast knowledge. This expressive Pikachu is like a middle-aged man.

data.name: Mr. Mime
data.flavorText: Its pantomime skills are wonderful. You may become enraptured while watching it, but next thing you know, Mr. Mime has made a real wall.

data.name: Mewtwo
data.flavorText: This Pokémon was created by years of horrific gene splicing and DNA engineering experiments.

data.name: Machamp
data.flavorText: It grasps its opponents with its four arms and twists them up in an intricate hold. People call it "the Machamp special."

data.name: Jigglypuff
data.flavorText: Recordings of Jigglypuff's strange lullabies can be purchased from department stores. These CDs can be found near the bedding area.

data.name: Snubbull
data.flavorText: It grows close to others easily and is also easily spoiled. The disparity between its face and its actions makes many young people wild about it.

data.name: Lickitung
data.flavorText: It checks out whatever's around it by licking everything. If you don't clean off a spot where it's licked you, you'll break out in a rash!

data.name: Ditto
data.flavorText: While it can transform into anything, each Ditto apparently has its own strengths and weaknesses when it comes to transformations.

data.name: Slaking
data.flavorText: The world's laziest Pokémon. It moves to another spot when there's no food left within its reach.
